member.name: T:JikanClient.Jikan
member.summary: The main class. Contains all methods for get data from MAL.

member.name: M:JikanClient.Jikan.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.param: True if you want to use HTTPS, false for HTTP, by default is true.

member.name: M:JikanClient.Jikan.GetAnimeCharactersAndStaff(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Anime Characters And Staff information from MyAnimeList

member.name: M:JikanClient.Jikan.GetAnimeEpisodes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Anime Episodes information from MyAnimeList

member.name: M:JikanClient.Jikan.GetAnimeEpisodes(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Anime Episodes information from MyAnimeList
member.param: The episodes page on MyAnimeList get paginated after 100 episodes. If there's an anime with more than 100 episodes, you'll have to use the parameter.

member.name: M:JikanClient.Jikan.GetAnimePictures(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Anime Pictures URL's from MyAnimeList

member.name: M:JikanClient.Jikan.GetAnimeVideos(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Anime Videos URL's from MyAnimeList

member.name: M:JikanClient.Jikan.GetAnimeForum(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Anime Forum's post from MyAnimeList

member.name: M:JikanClient.Jikan.GetAnimeMoreInfo(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Anime extra infromation from MyAnimeList

member.name: T:JikanClient.Resource.Errors
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:JikanClient.Resource.Errors.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:JikanClient.Resource.Errors.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:JikanClient.Resource.Errors.FailedRequest
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to GET request failed. Inner message: {0}.

member.name: P:JikanClient.Resource.Errors.NotEnum
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EnumerationValue must be of Enum type.

member.name: P:JikanClient.Resource.Errors.SerializationFailed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Serialization failed..
